name: TNT! (itch)
description:
TNT is a game originally made for the Duplicade Jam.

This game is currently 2-player local multiplayer only!

The game currently does not support gamepads, this will come soon.

Controls:

MOVE - WASD/Arrowkeys for Player1 and Player2 respectively.

DROP TNT - SPACE/ENTER for Player1 and Player2 respectively.

M - Pause/Resume background music

Features:

  • 2-Player Local VS! - Defeat your local friend!
  • 3 Level sizes - Mini, Medium and Large!
  • 25 handcrafted levels! - Possibly more in the future!
  • 2 Special types of TNT - Direction super TNT and Freeze TNT!
  • Classic Bomberman upgrades - Speed up and Range up!
  • Unique soundtrack created by Pim Stoit! (@ProNoob13 on twitter)

Possible future features:

  • Online play?! - Battle people across the world!
  • 4-Player local play! - Play with up to 4 people in the same room!
  • Built-in level editor! - Create custom maps!
  • Other gamemodes! - Think Minigames or Co-op team-based play!
  • Other things??? You decide! Comment and tell me what you think is missing!

Thanks for playing, and let me know what you think!
